WebLink.url:
{!URLFOR('/apex/dsfs__DocuSign_CreateEnvelope', null, [ SourceID = Contract.Id, DST=CASE(Contract.Renewal_Classification__c,"Addendum", Contract.Addendum_DST__c, "Addendum & Engines", Contract.Engine_DST__c +","+ Contract.Addendum_DST__c, "Addendum & APU", Contract.APU_DST__c+","+ Contract.Addendum_DST__c, Contract.Engine_DST__c +","+ Contract.APU_DST__c +","+ Contract.Addendum_DST__c), CRL = 'Email~'+ Contract.Renewal_Order_Recipient_Email__c +';FirstName~;LastName~'+ Contract.Contract_eSignature_Name__c +';Role~Receipt Name;RoutingOrder~1, Email~'+ Contract.Addendum_Recipient_Email__c +';FirstName~;LastName~'+ Contract.Addendum_eSignature_Name__c +';Role~Registered Owner;RoutingOrder~2,Email~MSPContracts@honeywell.com;FirstName~;LastName~MSP Contracts;Role~Honeywell;RoutingOrder~3', CES = 'Honeywell MSP Contract Addendum'+ Contract.SAP_Contract_Number__c +' ', CEM = 'Dear '+ Contract.Contract_eSignature_Name__c +',

Your MSP Engine and/or APU contract is up for renewal.This email includes a link to review, sign and return the associated addendum to renew MSP coverage for an additional term.

Upon completion of all electronic non-Honeywell signatures, the document will automatically be returned to Honeywell for countersigning and processing. Please note that all MSP reporting and payments must be current for Honeywell to process the MSP renewal. Once finalized, an executed copy will be emailed to all parties listed on page one of the agreement.

Thank you for your participation in our MSP Program and we look forward to providing you continued MSP service. If you have any questions, please direct your request to MSPContracts@Honeywell.com or call 1-602-365-6442.

Thank you,

MSP Engines & APU Contract Team', LA = '0', LF = '0', OCO = '' ] )}
